forest02.description: A clearing lies to the west, and a cave lies to the east.

mountain01.description: Where the forest ends, a mountain path with high walls begin. There are strange markings on the rock. A chasm lies to the north.

cave03.description: It is a dark and damp cave, there is little light escaping this far in.

cave04.description: It is a dark and damp cave, there is little light escaping this far in.

forest06.description: The path comes to a crossroads in the thick forest. To the north lies an old bridge across the stream, to the west the mountain, impassable from here.

mountain02.description: The winding mountain path continues, strange markings scattered across the the rock walls.

forest05.description: A stream lies to the north, a newly felled tree acting as a bridge. A stagnant pond lies south, better not get too close..

forest03.description: A stream blocks the path south. Remains of a bridge lie on both sides of the stream. A newly felled tree bridges the stream.

forest08.description: The forest ends with the mountain which lies ahead, impassable except for the path to the north.

cave05.description: It is a dark and damp cave, it is nearly pitch black.

mountain04.description: The winding mountain path continues, strange markings scattered across the the rock walls.

forest07.description: A few rays of sunlight penetrate the forest canopy. A stagnant pond lies west, better not get too close.

forest04.description: The forest is thick as the path ends. A bridge of dubious sturdiness lies across the stream south. The stream ends in a fall into a chasm to the east.

mountain05.description: The winding mountain path comes to an end, strange markings scattered across the the rock walls. You can make out a hidden opening into the mountain.

cave02.description: It is a damp cave, the only light is coming from the west.

forest01.description: A clearing in the forest, created by logging some time ago if the old tree stumps are anything to go by.

mountain03.description: A spacious cave carved out of the mountain into a hall. Pews line the path to the back of the room.

cave01.description: It is a damp cave, the only light coming from the west doorway, facing the forest.
